column4: Hm, I run Diablo II through wine but when I close it it just hangs and I have to kill it all the time with kill and killall using PIDs. Is there a way to get the PID of a process using a bash command and then joining that with kill so it does it automatically?
if you do 'killall wine' it should kill it
It is :(. So kill -9 and kill are my only ways to kill the wine process. So I need to know how do I get the PID :P
Yes, that's what I need to know :P
neither do I, but it's alright :)
here's what I have so far
Hey, that was just what I was searching for ^_^
heh, you're right xD... I need to get used to read them all all the time :P
Hey, thanks a lot, now it's closing nicely
If you want to know, I did "kill -9 | ps -C wineserver -o pid=" ^_^
